item.description:
I don't know about you, but I need to see the new Star Trek movie opening weekend!

AMC Loews Boston Common hasn't published their showtimes yet, but there's usually one about 7pm. I'll keep an eye out for posted showtimes and update the meetup when they're out.

There's a 7:00 show in IMAX-3D - and I think this'll be a fantastic way to experience this movie! I'd strongly suggest buying your tickets in advance given this is opening weekend!

You can buy tickets here.

We'll meet in the lobby before the movie - I'll be there starting at 6pm and I'll wear my red fedora so I'll be easy to find.

I'd love to go out afterwards for drinks and chatting - I'm open to suggestions.

Hope to see you all there!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet up in the lobby before the move - I'll be wearing my red Fedora!
item.name: Star Trek Into Darkness
